right.text: I guess this is how low I am in the pecking order, happily accepting orders from 10-year-olds...

left.text: oh, excellent. he expects me to wait around for some form of feedback on said PM too.

right.text: so, uh, is Guy here even? as in not away
tell me what he'll think of my PM

left.text: could you tell Guy to check his PM?
